individual_responses.summary: Phase 2 implementation is functionally complete and meets performance objectives, though with a file location deviation. The core `SymbolIndex`, `ImportIndex`, and `FastResolver` classes are implemented correctly and integrated into `ast_analysis.py` and `generator.py`. The deviation involves placing the new module in the parent `analysis` directory instead of the specified `optimization` sub-package, which contradicts the architectural intent of Phase 1 but does not break functionality.
